description: This plugin is used to display calendar events. You can drag-n-drop and resize events with a simple workflow to save changes to your backend plus Display your business hours too!
name: Full Calendar Scheduler Suite
plugin_instructions:
Full Documentation and instructions can be found here: https://jared-gibb.gitbook.io/fullcalendar-plugin-suite/

Here is the demo's editor! Check it out and start using it today! 

https://bit.ly/FullCalendarSchedulerSuiteEditor

****For google cal API calls, you should put some form of error handling in place.
